name: Composite Winner*
description:
“Hey little buddy! Glad to see you’re awake. Mind trying to get over to that flag over there? Use your directional arrows to try and move around and if you're stuck, feel free to refresh."

Here's our first "completed" gameand expect improvements in the future!

Feel free to try it out or donate to the game if you'd like to support our dev endeavors, a simple dollar means a lot.
